txt.en: <rgb=#FF0000>Completing Aiding the Eastemnet will cancel this quest</rgb>

'A force of Easterlings has crossed the river and is now rampaging through the farms to the north-east of here. They have come on horse-back and are destroying the crops and harassing the villagers.\n\n'Go to the eastern plains of the Wold and help defeat them and drive them back.'
'They will come across the river again, and when they do, I know that I can depend on you to be ready.'
'Let me know when you are ready to join the battle in the eastern plains of the Wold.'\n\n<rgb=#FF0000>This is an instanced public questing area.</rgb>
Easterlings are raiding the farms in the eastern Wold.
Defeated mounted Easterlings in the eastern plains of the Wold ([placeholder]/[placeholder])
Defeat mounted Easterlings in the eastern plains of the Wold ([placeholder]/[placeholder])
Mounted Easterlings can be found in the eastern plains of the Wold.\n\nWigbald asked you to defeat the Easterlings rampaging through the farms of the Wold.
Wigbald is at Harwick.\n\nWigbald will be pleased to hear that many mounted Easterlings were defeated.
